titles.title: Cylindrical vase with an Olmec deity in profile

texts.textentryhtml: Gift of Jeanette Pepper Bello (1918 - 2016) and Myer Bello (d. 2003), to the Princeton University Art Museum, 1985.

bibliography.boilertext: "Acquisitions of the Art Museum 1985," Record of the Art Museum, Princeton University 45, no. 1 (1986): p.16–42

geography.displaygeography: Place made: North America, Mexico, Central Mexico, Tlapacoya

caption: Olmec style, Early Formative Period (Manantial phase), 1100–900 BCE, Central Mexico, Mexico, Mesoamerica, Cylindrical vase with an Olmec deity in profile. Ceramic; 17.5 x 11.7 cm. Gift of Jeanette and Myer Bello (y1985-19)
